title: ISic020584. ISic020584
body:
Facsimile Images

Ῥο͂μι

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

The name Ῥο͂μις is found in a long defixio from Selinunte (ISic030007, ll. 6, 17) as a male anthroponym and in Delphi as an artist's name (Lazzarini, DVA no. 136).
